TopicTitle: Folders in SPH and VAB for Craft file organization

Articles.Content: Just like the title implies, I request a mod that gives you you the ability to make folders in which you can store multiple crafts, for organization. Or some sort of sorting method for crafts. I'm really unhappy looking through hundreds or more crafts to find a single one. I know that non part adding mods are really hard, but consider this the ultimate sacrifice, FOR SCIE... uh OCD!

As a workaround you can alt-tab and move .craft files in and out of subfolders while the game is running. I do this so I can keep my load/save folder only containing the .craft files I'm actually using.
